title: Rigidity of the subelliptic heat kernel on $\operatorname{SU}
abstract:
We study heat kernel rigidity for the Lie group $\operatorname{SU}\left( 2
\right)$ kernel equipped with a sub-Riemannian structure. We prove that a
metric measure space equipped with a heat kernel of a special form is
bundle-isometric to the Hopf fibration $\operatorname{U}\left( 1 \right)\to
\operatorname{SU}\left( 2 \right)\to \mathbb{CP}^1$, which coincides with the
sub-Riemannian sphere $\operatorname{SU}\left( 2 \right)$.
